website_summaries.verdict: A unique helmet with both practical and unusual features with a downside that includes a few comfort and durability concerns.
pros: Not only does this helmet provide reasonable protection and come with a handy face mask, but it also has built-in audio in the ear pads
Comes in a variety of sizes and several colors
cons: The chin strap tends to be uncomfortable, difficult to adjust, and isn't long enough for some wearers
Construction doesn't seem quite as rugged as some competitors
Cord that operates the sound system is flimsy

customer_reviews.title: (reassures me that they won't easily disconnect while skiing) After that it worked like a ...
customer_reviews.text: For a helmet at this price point I am extremely impressed. The sizing was spot on. The audio isn't so loud that you're not aware of what's going on. It's just loud enough to still jam out. There were some reviews on the helmet where people had said that they had to get new aux cords to replace the stock option. My music wasn't playing right at first either so I thought that's what it may be. However, I quickly realized that you had to push fairly hard to join the main and female ends together. (reassures me that they won't easily disconnect while skiing) After that it worked like a charm.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great ski helmet, fits nice and looks great have to return and get another one.
customer_reviews.text: Great ski helmet, looks great and fits very nicely but the audio brainteaser is not working correctly. I can hear only in my right ear. I have tried various ways of connecting to my ipod shuffle but end up only hearing from the right side. I am returning this one and reordering another one. Hope the next one works correctly. I would have given it a 5 star but the audio portion did not work correctly.

customer_reviews.title: which is not very comfortable and feels a bit like its choking you when ...
customer_reviews.text: For the money you're not going to find another helmet with integrated audio. It serves its function well,thought the construction does feel a little cheap. My only major complaint is that the chin strap is single strand nylon and fits under the chin near the throat, which is not very comfortable and feels a bit like its choking you when it's fastened down tightly. Would be five stars if they changed the chin strap to just be double nylon to fit on the chin!
customer_reviews.author: Fightinfriar

customer_reviews.title: Buy A Different Balaclava, But The Helmets Good .
customer_reviews.text: The helmet fits good and the built in speakers are decent. Don't expect Sennheiser headphone quality, but they play music and it sounds fine. Not so loud that you can't hear your surroundings either, which I think is important. The balaclava is no good though. It was alright for my snowboard trip because it was a last minute purchase, but definitely pick yourself up another decent one to go with the helmet. Love it for the price!
customer_reviews.author: ChampStamp

customer_reviews.title: audio is about as good as I expected it to be
customer_reviews.text: very decent helmet for the price. audio is about as good as I expected it to be, which isn't great, but its a massive step up from hooking earbuds over my ears when on the slopes in an attempt to hear both music and my surroundings. I always buy a large helmet and they always fit, this is no exception. The balaclava is not the one pictured, so if that's your selling point, don't bother. Over all, it's a great deal, and I would buy again or recommend to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Montana

customer_reviews.title: Saved my brain! But the headphones stink.
customer_reviews.text: First day out this season I took a hard slam and broke my collar bone. The helmet should have cracked from the impact but held strong. I was actually kind of impressed. The sizing is a little small, especially if you try to wear a beanie under it, so make sure to get a size larger than normal. The headphones aren’t wireless/Bluetooth. So there is an annoying wire that you have to deal with. Overall thankful for the sturdieness of the helmet though! Worth the purchase
customer_reviews.author: Sutton Black

customer_reviews.title: Helmet Great...accessories horrible
customer_reviews.text: Helmet is great! It fit well and kept my head warm. The balaclava is nice and warm by itself, but it is waaaay to thick and bunchy to comfortably fit under the helmet. The speakers are the worst of all! A lot of reviews said the "sound was as to be expected", but that's if you like the quietest speakers ever! Also, the wired connection started shorting out right out of the box. This helmet should be sold for cheaper without the faulty accessories that it comes with.

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality product and far too small

customer_reviews.text: Helmet is awesome. Fit/look/SAFETY was great on slopes yesterday and was surprised that the sound was pretty good. Also, the chinstrap is perfect! Happy with the purchase. Goodbye rental helmets, hello savings!!

customer_reviews.title: Good helmet and good sound
customer_reviews.text: The helmet is sturdy and works as should. The sound system is good. At first I thought the volume would be too low but after skiing with it I discovered that it could actually be too loud. Volume control is conveniently located to turn it down. The only complaint I have is there is no pause or skip option. You can turn the volume up or down but that is all the control you get. Other than that, for the price it is very good. Sturdy helmet with good sound.
